bibl.title: A Manual of Egyptian Pottery. Volume 4: Ptolemaic Period - Modern. (AERA Field Manual Series. 1, 4.)
bibl.note: Preface. - 1. Pottery production and processing in the field. - 2. Post-excavation studies. - 3. Ceramic glossary. - 4. Further reading: a general selection on ceramics. - 5. Clay and fabric description used in volume 4. - 6. Egyptian pottery: Ptolemaic period; - Roman period; - Late Roman period; - Medieval; - Modern. - 7. Further reading: a selection for volume 4.
